channel.title: Wont Save
channel.description:
Everytime i log in it doesn't save and it resets me to lvl 3 :\ This is what i get when some1 logs in
[code]For input string: "character-donator = 00" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "character-donator = 00" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.loadgame(client.java:8955) at client.run(client.java:16340) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
